snippet: Quieting fears of instability on the European Union’s eastern fringe, Prime Minister Victor Ponta agreed to follow a court decision on an impeachment referendum for the president.
abstract: Prime Minister Victor Ponta of Romania agrees to follow a court decision on an impeachment referendum for Pres Traian Basescu, pending a forthcoming referendum on impeachment.
lead_paragraph: Quieting fears of instability on the European Union’s eastern fringe, Prime Minister Victor Ponta agreed to follow a court decision on an impeachment referendum for the president.

headline.seo: Romania’s Ponta Relents, Easing Constitutional Tension
headline.main: Premier of Romania Relents in Standoff
